translations: 以……为主题的；特定历史时期的；围绕特定主题的
以……为主题（theme 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: This iPod Touch themed bedding comes complete with duvet and pillowcases which has a really unique and cool design.
sentences.translation: 这一 iPod Touch 主题寝具品种齐全，有羽绒被褥，有枕头，其设计真是既别致又很酷。

sentences.sentence: They released special themed versions of the game at Halloween and Christmas last year, and are publishing a Valentine's edition.
sentences.translation: 他们在去年的万圣节和圣诞节发布了这款游戏的特别主题版本，并正在发布情人节版本。

sentences.sentence: It is believed that taking the panda-themed tourist train to Zunyi is an enjoyable experience.
sentences.translation: 人们认为乘坐熊猫主题的旅游列车前往遵义是一次愉快的经历。
